Pediatricians told us all that our son had a cold, and we could not cure it, but we went to a private doctor and found out that we had whooping cough (one of the components of DPT), if we did not find out in time that we had whooping cough, everything could have ended very badly.

And only recently, closer to two years old, he began to speak again (this was just a complication on the Central nervous system).

In the autumn, in the midst of an epidemic of SARS and influenza, I was pregnant with the second child, as you know, pregnancy lowers the immune system, it is necessary for the development of a normal pregnancy, but unfortunately also contributes to the development of all sorts of infectious diseases that is not safe during pregnancy, especially early in its timing.

Of course, I did not want to take anything, even if it was allowed to be used during pregnancy, but then my eldest daughter came with a temperature from kindergarten, which pushed me to go to the pharmacy faster.

I used the instructions for the entire autumn-winter period and to my joy did not get sick even in a light form, although at work and in General in the district, every second went with a runny nose and cough.
Now grippferon is always in my medicine Cabinet, and I recommend others, especially future mothers, as an effective and safe remedy.
The choice fell on the grippferon spray, especially since the manufacturer writes about its safety during pregnancy.

One day after another cold, the doctor assigned us the antiviral drug Aflubin (Bittner) for the treatment of the older and younger child (8 months) for prevention, as a result, the daughter was in kindergarten in a week, and the youngest was not even ill, which was infinitely happy.

After the first time, I thought it was a coincidence, but when it went on several times and we managed only "snot" or a slight malaise for 2-3 days, Aflubin became the best assistant for me in the fight against colds.
